column2: SELECT E.SystemStudentID AS StudentID, E.GradeLevel AS EnrollmentGrade, E.SchoolYear4Digit AS SchoolYear4Digit, T.TestPeriod AS Period, T.TestSubjectGroup AS AssessmentSubject, # AS MetricSource, T.TestType AS MetricName, CONVERT (int, T.TestScore) AS Score, # AS IsMostRecent FROM Enrollment AS E INNER JOIN TestScores as T ON E.SystemStudentID = T.SystemStudentID WHERE E.EnrollmentStatus = # AND E.IsActiveEnrollment = #; INSERT INTO Metrics SELECT E.SystemStudentID AS StudentID, E.GradeLevel AS EnrollmentGrade, E.SchoolYear4Digit AS SchoolYear4Digit, ES.Period AS Period, # AS AssessmentSubject, # AS MetricSource, # AS MetricName, ES.Score AS Score, # AS IsMostRecent FROM Enrollment AS E INNER JOIN EmotionalScreener as ES ON E.SystemStudentID = ES.StudentID WHERE E.EnrollmentStatus = # AND E.IsActiveEnrollment = #; INSERT INTO Metrics SELECT E.SystemStudentID AS StudentID, E.GradeLevel AS EnrollmentGrade, E.SchoolYear4Digit AS SchoolYear4Digit, # AS Period, # AS AssessmentSubject, # AS MetricSource, # AS MetricName, SUM (PE.Hours) AS Score, # AS IsMostRecent FROM Enrollment AS E INNER JOIN ParentEngagement as PE ON E.SystemStudentID = PE.StudentID WHERE E.EnrollmentStatus = # AND E.IsActiveEnrollment = # GROUP BY E.SystemStudentID, E.GradeLevel, E.SchoolYear4Digit;
